main event: Sighting of an unidentified aerial object near Silver Springs, Maryland on September 22, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to be at a high altitude and was moving at a very rapid rate.
The object stopped and hovered for a short time before accelerating to a very high speed and disappearing.
The object did not appear to be an aircraft or satellite and did not have the characteristics of either.
The object was described as circular in shape, not quite saucer-like, and approximately 50-75 feet in diameter.
The object was surrounded by a bright, pulsating glow or halo and was completely silent.
sighted object: a large, circular object with a bright, pulsating glow
